00023 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_SCHED_RT_H
00024 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_SCHED_RT_H
00025 
00026 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_SCHED_H
00027 #error "please don't include nucleus/sched-rt.h directly"
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /* Priority scale for the RT scheduling class. */
00031 #define XNSCHED_RT_MIN_PRIO     0
00032 #define XNSCHED_RT_MAX_PRIO     257
00033 #define XNSCHED_RT_NR_PRIO      (XNSCHED_RT_MAX_PRIO - XNSCHED_RT_MIN_PRIO + 1)
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * Builtin priorities shared by SCHED_FIFO over Cobalt and RTDM, only
00037  * use a sub-range of the available priority levels from the RT
00038  * scheduling class, in order to exhibit a 1:1 mapping with Linux's
00039  * SCHED_FIFO ascending priority scale [1..99].
00040  */
00041 #define XNSCHED_LOW_PRIO        0
00042 #define XNSCHED_HIGH_PRIO       99
00043 #define XNSCHED_IRQ_PRIO        XNSCHED_RT_MAX_PRIO /* For IRQ servers. */
00044 
00045 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00046 
00047 #if defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCALABLE_SCHED) && \
00048   XNSCHED_RT_NR_PRIO > XNSCHED_MLQ_LEVELS
00049 #error "RT class cannot use multi-level queue (too many priority levels)"
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 extern struct xnsched_class xnsched_class_rt;
00053 
00054 extern struct xnsched_class xnsched_class_idle;
00055 
00056 #define xnsched_class_default xnsched_class_rt
00057 
00058 static inline void __xnsched_rt_requeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00059 {
00060         sched_insertpql(&thread->sched->rt.runnable,
00061                         &thread->rlink, thread->cprio);
00062 }
00063 
00064 static inline void __xnsched_rt_enqueue(struct xnthread *thread)
00065 {
00066         sched_insertpqf(&thread->sched->rt.runnable,
00067                         &thread->rlink, thread->cprio);
00068 }
00069 
00070 static inline void __xnsched_rt_dequeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00071 {
00072         sched_removepq(&thread->sched->rt.runnable, &thread->rlink);
00073 }
00074 
00075 static inline struct xnthread *__xnsched_rt_pick(struct xnsched *sched)
00076 {
00077         struct xnpholder *h = sched_getpq(&sched->rt.runnable);
00078         return h ? link2thread(h, rlink) : NULL;
00079 }
00080 
00081 static inline void __xnsched_rt_setparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00082                                          const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00083 {
00084         thread->cprio = p->rt.prio;
00085         if (xnthread_test_state(thread, XNSHADOW)) {
00086                 if (thread->cprio)
00087                         xnthread_clear_state(thread, XNOTHER);
00088                 else
00089                         xnthread_set_state(thread, XNOTHER);
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 static inline void __xnsched_rt_getparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00094                                          union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00095 {
00096         p->rt.prio = thread->cprio;
00097 }
00098 
00099 static inline void __xnsched_rt_trackprio(struct xnthread *thread,
00100                                           const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00101 {
00102         if (p)
00103                 __xnsched_rt_setparam(thread, p);
00104         else
00105                 thread->cprio = thread->bprio;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static inline void __xnsched_rt_forget(struct xnthread *thread)
00109 {
00110 }
00111 
00112 static inline int xnsched_rt_init_tcb(struct xnthread *thread)
00113 {
00114         return 0;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void xnsched_rt_tick(struct xnthread *curr);
